Tanzania decreased from 48.3% to 44.4%, which is equivalent to approximately 0.7 ppt/

The Health Sector Development Project II (HSDP II) was launched in 2003 with support 
from the World Bank and pooled funds from development partners. Total project funding 
was US$ 1.83 billion, 14% of which was designated for nutrition and food security
